title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I encountered an issue with the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I'm not sure what exactly is happening.
OB: There is no information provided about the observed behavior.
EB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy in a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I receive the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, I'm not sure what the error message means.
SR: Unfortunately, there are no steps to reproduce provided.
